10.3 RÃ©gression Logistique
ModÃ¨le linÃ©aire simple et interprÃ©table :
Ã‰quation du modÃ¨le :
\[
\log\left(\frac{p}{1-p}\right) = \beta_0 + \sum_{i=1}^{10} \beta_i \cdot A_i + \beta_{age} \cdot age + \beta_{fh} \cdot family\_history
\]
Coefficients significatifs :

A1_Score : Î² = 2.34 (p < 0.001)
A2_Score : Î² = 1.98 (p < 0.001)
A3_Score : Î² = 1.76 (p < 0.01)
